colour.models.rgb.dataset.eci_rgb_v2 Module¶

ECI RGB v2 Colourspace¶

Defines the ECI RGB v2 colourspace:

  • ECI_RGB_V2_COLOURSPACE.

See also

RGB Colourspaces Jupyter Notebook

References

[1]European Color Initiative. (2002). ECI RGB v2. Retrieved from http://www.eci.org/_media/downloads/icc_profiles_from_eci/ecirgbv20.zip
colour.models.rgb.dataset.eci_rgb_v2.ECI_RGB_V2_PRIMARIES = array([[ 0.67010309, 0.32989691], [ 0.20990566, 0.70990566], [ 0.14006179, 0.08032956]])¶

ECI RGB v2 colourspace primaries.

ECI_RGB_V2_PRIMARIES : ndarray, (3, 2)

colour.models.rgb.dataset.eci_rgb_v2.ECI_RGB_V_ILLUMINANT = 'D50'¶

ECI RGB v2 colourspace whitepoint name as illuminant.

ECI_RGB_V_ILLUMINANT : unicode

colour.models.rgb.dataset.eci_rgb_v2.ECI_RGB_V2_WHITEPOINT = array([ 0.3457, 0.3585])¶

ECI RGB v2 colourspace whitepoint.

ECI_RGB_V2_WHITEPOINT : ndarray
